remarks: If ` F ` is a section of ` G ` , then ` F ` is a monomorphism.  A monomorphism that arises from a section is also known as a _split monomorphism_.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)

sectmon.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
sectmon.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
